title: Manohari Ruby & Diamond Haaram with Matching Jhumkas
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Features a lustrous pearl drop on the Jhumkas. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Delicate floral and heart motifs are interwoven with intricate gold filigree work. The Haaram features a cascading design with ruby drops, elegantly framed by sparkling CZ diamonds. The Jhumkas showcase a classic temple design, adorned with matching rubies and a pearl drop for added sophistication. Modernized Haaram design allows for versatile styling.
occasions: and special family gatherings. Also suitable for elegant modern events.
description: A harmonious blend of tradition and contemporary design. The vibrant rubies are ethically sourced and expertly cut to maximize brilliance. The high-quality CZ diamonds provide a dazzling sparkle at an accessible price point. Durable and timeless, this set can be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and prevents tarnishing. A statement piece that embodies Telugu heritage and modern elegance.
